page.title: 03Amenities in Wetley Rocks.
page.content: There is a lack of amenities in our area.There are at present a number of small village shops but really we need a big supermarket so that people would not have to travel to Hanley,Cheadle or Newcastle to do their weekly shopping. A health centre,more doctors and a dentist would help the village, particularly the elderly. A leisure centre, a theatre and a cinema would improve entertainment. These facilities at the moment are a long way away and we have to have a car to get to them as the bus services are very limited. However,If we had all these things it would spoil the quiet and peaceful nature of the village. Space would have to be made which would mean part of the old village being destroyed. Most people would prefer that the village stayed the same.
